author: forthommel
body:
Backport of the various 9_0_X CTPPS developments for Spring 2017 re-reco campaign of the 2016 data collection.

Includes the following PRs:
* #16010: updated DetId
* #16616: diamonds raw-to-digi
* #17535: geometry thread safety ; diamonds geometry +  rechits
* #17701: miniAOD lite local tracks

`runTheMatrix.py -l limited` yielded: `9 8 6 4 1 1 1 tests passed, 1 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 failed` at 1st pass (DAS query issue)
title: CTPPS: backport of 9_0_X developments to 8_0_X
